{{outdated|In [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], this format has been replaced with the [[data component format]].|edition=java}}
<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
**{{nbt|list|Enchantments}}: Contains [[enchantment]]s on this item that affect the way the item works.
*** {{nbt|compound}}: A single enchantment.
**** {{nbt|string|id}}: The name of the enchantment.
**** {{nbt|short|lvl}}: The level of the enchantment, where 1 is level 1. Values are clamped between 0 and 255 when reading. 
** {{nbt|list|StoredEnchantments}}: Contains enchantments for [[enchanted book]]s.
*** {{nbt|compound}}: A stored enchantment, identical structure to each enchantment in '''Enchantments'''.
** {{nbt|int|RepairCost}}: Number of experience levels to add to the base level cost when repairing, combining, or renaming this item with an [[Anvil]].
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
